description: This is the validation schema for the augur produced metadata JSON, for consumption in Auspice. Note that every field is optional, but excluding fields may disable certain features in Auspice.
title: Nextstrain minimal metadata JSON schema

___updated.description: Auspice displays this in the footer

___start.description: Gene start position (zero-based, i.e. BED format)

___end.description: Gene end position (zero-based half open, i.e. BED format)

___annotations.description: Genome annotations (e.g. genes), relative to the reference genome

___start.description: Gene start position (zero-based, i.e. BED format)

___end.description: Gene end position (zero-based half open, i.e. BED format)

___title.description: Auspice displays this at the top of the page

___^[a-z_]*$.description: The values (of the demes) for this geographic resolutions
___^[a-z_]*$.$comment: E.g. Brazil, China etc. The tree nodes must contain these as values of the geographic resolution key

___^[a-z]*$.description: The names of the geographic resolutions
___^[a-z]*$.$comment: E.g. country or region. These need to be present as keys in the attrs of the tree nodes

___geo.description: The available options for the geographic resolution dropdown

___^[A-Za-z_]*$.description: property name is the key used on the tree node attrs

___color_map.description: Links values to colors. Enforces a discrete scale, no matter what the "type" property is.
___color_map.$comment: A greyscale ramp will be used for missing values (i.e. defined on the tree but not here)

___menuItem.description: Text to be displayed in the "color by" dropdown menu

___type.description: Dictates how the color scale should be made

___legendTitle.description: Text to be displayed in the "color by" tree menu

___color_options.$comment: These properties need to be present as keys in the attrs of the tree nodes

___commit.description: Augur commit used to prepare these JSONs
___commit.$comment: DEPRECATED. Will be replaced with version in 0.1

___^.+$.$comment: in the future these properties may be required

___n.description: Number of sequences / samples associated with this publication

___paper_url.description: URL link to paper or NCBI genome. Use "?" if unknown

___author_info.description: Used to display information about terminal nodes & for filtering by author (if "authors" is in "filters", see below)
___author_info.$comment: Each key is typically an author name, e.g. "Black et al", and must exist in the attrs object of at least one terminal node of the tree

___maintainer.description: Auspice displays the maintainer in the footer

items.description: href for the text. E.g. mailto:, twitter link, lab website

___virus_count.description: Auspice uses this in the header info text and the status page. Should be renamed or deprecated for version 1.0

___filters.description: These appear as filters in the footer of Auspice (which populates the displayed values based upon the tree)
___filters.$comment: These values must be present as keys on the attr of nodes on the tree

___defaults.description: Set the defaults for certain display options in Auspice. All are optional.

___mapTriplicate.description: Should the map be extended / wrapped around. Useful if transmissions are worldwide.

___colorBy.$comment: The value here must be present in the color_options object (see above)

___geoResolution.$comment: The value here must be present in the geo object (see above)

___^.+$.$comment: must exist as a strain name on the tree. Currently the value is unused.
